body:
# Creation of a custom BIOS
##### Daniel Case, BSCS
##### Jacob Deines, BSCS
##### Joshua Nelson, BSCS
##### Faculty Mentor: Dr. Abdullah Tosh Kakar

### Project Description
We will be implementing a custom BIOS that will complete the necessary basic functions:
- Checking all device drivers upon start up
- Power On Self Test (POST)
- Loading into the bootloader (GRUB, Windows Bootloader, etc.)
- Inclusion of a basic user interface 

You can also download the [Proposal Document.](http://cloud.github.com/downloads/biosProject/biosRepo/BIOS%20Project%20Proposal.pdf)
